chapter.text: Perish the hands of Abu Lahab, (the instruments of his cruel actions against those who recognized Allah) and likewise perish he
Neither his wealth nor all his gains will save him from what awaits him of retributive punishment
He shall suffer the blazing fire which emits mountainous flames
Along with his slanderous wife who carried bundles of thorny wood (and laid them in the Prophetâ€™s path to cause him bodily injury and to render his mission vain)
She shall be necklaced with a similar twisted rope to double her torment and augment her pain
